item.title: Here’s How The iPhone 17 Air Might Look Next To iPhone 16 Pro Max
item.description: The iPhone 17 Air looks almost half as thick as the iPhone 16 Pro Max in the latest images shared by reputed leaker Majin Bu.

item.title: Some Disappointing News About The ‘3 Body Problem’ Season 2 Release Date On Netflix
item.description: 3 Body Problem seasons 2 and 3 are coming, but a new update about their release dates mean this will be one of the longest gaps in streaming.

item.title: Key Takeaways From Intel Foundry Direct Connect 2025
item.description: All of the EDA providers voiced their impressions of Intel 18A, which were universally positive.
